title: Kings Mountain National Military Park: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park       Visiting Kings Mountain National Military Park and the other 393 parks is the best way to support the parks, but we also appreciate your donation of time through volunteering and monetary donations. There are many opportunities to help support Kings Mountain National Military Park. Join the Brigade of Friends group which is an all volunteer nonprofit organization founded to provide support and funding for special projects at the park. Many special initiatives and educational programs are supported by donations from the community. If you would like to support Kings Mountain NMP by donating, please check out our donation webpage. Volunteering is another way to support Kings Mountain NMP, there are various volunteer opportunities available. Are you interested in reenacting? Become a member of the park's living history group, The Backcountry Militia.   You can also support the park when you purchase items from our Eastern National bookstore. A percentage of sales is given back to the park to help with our interpretative and educational programs.
